Address.Address1: ALEMDAR MAH. INCILI CAVUS SOK NO 35 SULTANAHMET

Description.Text:
Ares hotel is located in one of the oldest and most colorful quarters of Istanbul in the old historical peninsula. Whether you are in Istanbul for business or leisure, Ares hotels rooms will cover all your needs with its contemporary well planned setting and comfort. All rooms offer orthopedic beds, air conditioner, direct dial telephone, LCD TV, free wireless internet, minibar. Delicious open buffet breakfast is offered complimentary. Discover Istanbul from the best point old peninsula which is covered with centuries old buildings, mosques, churches, synagogues; gong and azan mixed to each other is a culture, shopping and entertainment center of Istanbul. Ares Hotel is situated just at the heart of peninsula. Historical peninsula may be reached in about 2 minutes. Sultanahmet district which hosts Roman, Byzantine and Ottoman cultures is awaiting you to reveal its hidden beauties. Famous world heritages such as Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Basilica Cistern, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar and many more are here.

Ares Hotel is a very special boutique hotel located right at the heart of Sultanahmet and the hotel enjoys a spectacular and unique panorama, a rare one in the world.

Please note that property has private airport pick up service for hotel guests. From Ataturk airport to Ares Hotel the fee for this service 30 euro one way for both way 50 euro. The hotel also provides barbecue area, dry cleaning, lobby and reception. Parking facilities - at cost of 13 euro a night.

Ares Hotel is situated just at the heart of peninsula just 50m away from World famous Hagia Sophia,Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace. Basilica Cister ( underground museum ) 2 minutes by walk, 5 minutes to Grand Bazaar away by walk, 2 minutes to Sultanahmet tram stop away by walk, 3 minutes to Turkish & Islamic art museum away by walk, 3 minutes to The Archeological Museum away by walk, 20 minutes to Galata Tower and Taksim square away by walk and many more are here.

Single Room - Single Room offers a Double Bed (French bed) with a very comfortable mattress. Attractively decorated and furnished. The rooms have bathtub, full air conditioner, LCD TV, Minibar, Hair dryer, Alarm clock, Balcony/Terrace, Bathroom amenities, Cable/Satellite TV, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Heating, Internet access, Laundry service, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Refrigerator, Safe in room, Shared bathroom, Shaver in bathroom, Telephone and 24hrs room service.
Double/Twin Room - Double/Twin Room offers a Double Bed (French bed) or 2 twin beds with a very comfortable mattress. Attractively decorated and furnished. The rooms have bathtub, full air conditioner, LCD TV, Minibar, Hair dryer, Alarm clock, Balcony/Terrace, Bathroom amenities, Cable/Satellite TV, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Heating, Internet access, Laundry service, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Refrigerator, Safe in room, Shared bathroom, Shaver in bathroom, Telephone and 24hrs room service.
Triple Room - Triple Room offers a Double Bed (French bed) and one single bed with a very comfortable mattress. Attractively decorated and furnished. The rooms have bathtub, full air conditioner, LCD TV, Minibar, Hair dryer, Alarm clock, Balcony/Terrace, Bathroom amenities, Cable/Satellite TV, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Heating, Internet access, Laundry service, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Refrigerator, Safe in room, Shared bathroom, Shaver in bathroom, Telephone and 24hrs room service.
